articles.title: Alia Bhatt has something new to offer, but it is not another Bollywood venture - Moneycontrol
articles.description: It’s called Ed-a-Mamma, a kids wear brand that caters to the age group between 2-14. It was launched nearly six weeks back, and Bhatt says 70 percent of the first season or first batch of the collection was sold in these six weeks.
articles.content:
